entries.original_text:
Standardize data directory resolution
across server modules (db.js, index.js,
markdown.js) to avoid dependence on
process.cwd()
entries.translated_text:
标准化数据目录解析
跨服务器模块（db.js, index.js、
markdown.js）以避免对
process.cwd() 的依赖

entries.original_text:
Exploring mapping storage options

I'm considering how to set up a user interface for saving a
mapping of indices, like origldx to transldx, using select boxes. |
think we should save this mapping in entry metadata, maybe
adding an "alignment_map" field to the server's db.json. I'll need
to check if the server accepts unknown fields in the PUT
/api/entries call. Also, | think | should inspect the update logic in
server/index.js before making changes and see if Node watchers
are active to prevent restarting the server unnecessarily.
entries.translated_text:
探索映射存储选项

我正在考虑如何设置一个用户界面，用于通过选择框（select boxes）保存索引的映射（mapping），例如从 origldx 到 transldx。我认为我们应该将此映射保存在条目元数据（entry metadata）中，或许可以在服务器的 db.json 中添加一个 "alignment_map" 字段。我需要检查服务器是否在 PUT /api/entries 调用中接受未知字段（unknown fields）。此外，我认为在进行更改前应该检查 server/index.js 中的更新逻辑（update logic），并查看 Node 监视器（Node watchers）是否处于活动状态，以避免不必要地重启服务器。

entries.original_text:
1. A computer specifically used for installing APP crawling channels
(WINDOWS, above windows 10 and computer access is only granted to
limited personnel, 51talk channel staffs) @Jovic

2. The computer needs to install remote assistance software (TeamViewer)
@Jovic

3. Install the VPN account on the computer (to prevent the app from requiring
domestic login) @Jovic

4. How to centrally manage all bossjob accounts, and how to distinguish
between domestic and non-China accounts? Conclusion: During the first
phase of the initial testing, no distinction will be made between domestic
and non-China accounts. @ FE &

5. Which PRS account should be used for uploading? @Jovic

6. Confirmation of activation rules for new and old leads @ FE 5 @Aicca Roxas
, product features @ E51

7. Leads need to be sorted out in the allocation logic (especially the part
uploaded manually) @& Ei

8. Al-enabled documents (maintaining 5 document types) @% Ei

(E448)
entries.translated_text:
1. 一台专门用于安装APP爬取渠道的电脑（WINDOWS，Windows 10及以上版本，且电脑访问权限仅授予有限人员，51talk渠道员工）@Jovic

2. 电脑需要安装远程协助软件（TeamViewer）@Jovic

3. 在电脑上安装VPN账户（以防止app要求国内登录）@Jovic

4. 如何集中管理所有bossjob账户，以及如何区分国内和非中国账户？结论：在初步测试的第一阶段，将不区分国内和非中国账户。@ FE &

5. 应使用哪个PRS账户进行上传？@Jovic

6. 新旧leads的激活规则确认 @ FE 5 @Aicca Roxas，产品功能 @ E51

7. Leads需要在分配逻辑中进行梳理（特别是手动上传的部分）@& Ei

8. AI赋能的文档（维护5种文档类型）@% Ei

(E448)

entries.original_text:
| need to help the user package their Electron desktop app into a
macOS .app file. The project has specific configurations, such as
having Electron as a dev dependency and settings in the
package.json. | could use either electron-builder or electron-
packager for this task, but electron-builder is the easier option
and requires some configuration. | must also ensure to manage
running background commands correctly. Let's make sure to
bundle the app with static resources instead of relying on the
dev server during packaging!
entries.translated_text: 需要帮助用户将他们的 Electron 桌面应用打包成一个 macOS .app 文件。该项目具有特定配置，例如将 Electron 作为开发依赖项以及在 package.json 中的设置。| 可以使用 electron-builder 或 electron-packager 来完成此任务，但 electron-builder 是更简单的选项，并且需要进行一些配置。| 还必须确保正确管理后台运行命令。让我们确保在打包时将应用与静态资源捆绑，而不是依赖开发服务器！

entries.original_text:
Adjusting for production packaging

| need to consider the production packaging for the app.
Currently, main.js uses the DEV_APP_URL and a dev
environment, but for the packaged version, we should load local
files from "app/dist," which is built by Vite. I'll need to check if
there's a "build" script in the app/package.json by using the
appropriate functions to view that file. After building the
frontend, | must adjust main.js to properly load the packaged
assets instead of relying on the development environment.
entries.translated_text:
调整生产打包

| 需要考虑该应用的生产打包。
目前，main.js 使用 DEV_APP_URL 和一个开发环境，但对于打包版本，我们应该从 "app/dist" 加载本地文件，该目录由 Vite 构建。我需要通过使用适当的函数来查看 app/package.json 文件，检查其中是否存在 "build" 脚本。在构建前端后，| 必须调整 main.js 以正确加载打包的资源，而不是依赖开发环境。

entries.original_text:
i: Stop backend server (port 3001) to prepare for a clean restart
Start backend server again (node index.js)
Verify backend is listening on http://localhost:3001
entries.translated_text:
i: 停止后端服务器（端口 3001）以准备进行干净重启
再次启动后端服务器（node index.js）
验证后端是否正在监听 http://localhost:3001
